about_the_game:
NBB Songs that bomb is a collection of the best tunes from the eclectic sci-fi universe of the game NBB.exe.

Log back into the NBB.exe system with the noisiest beeps and bloops heard all over the NBB Arena.

From the uplifting victories to the corrupted memory spaces. Relive the struggle that bombers face when chasing NBB stardom (but in a good way).

This soundtrack also includes a mini art book accessible directly from steam - or in your downloaded files as a PDF.

This is an additional downloadable package and does not include the base game.
